defineBusinessRules.output: Rule ID or confirmation of rule creation
defineBusinessRules.description: Define a new business rule based on the provided data.

steps.expectedOutcome: Ensure the data adheres to predefined formats and does not contain anomalies.

steps.action: Check for duplicates or conflicting rules in the system.
steps.expectedOutcome: Ensure that the new rule doesn't interfere with existing rules.

steps.action: Save the rule data to the business rules repository.
steps.expectedOutcome: Rule data is stored persistently in the system.

steps.action: Generate a unique Rule ID for the new rule.
steps.expectedOutcome: Every rule can be identified and referenced using its unique ID.

steps.action: Return the Rule ID or a confirmation of rule creation to the requester.
steps.expectedOutcome: The requester is informed of the successful creation of the new rule.
